code: var baseURL='http://192.168.1.2:8080/';var ShopServices={getShop:function getShop(){return fetch(baseURL+"shop/").then(function(res){return res.json();});},getShopMenu:function getShopMenu(id){return fetch(baseURL+"shop/"+id+"/menu").then(function(res){return res.json();});},postShop:function postShop(payload){return fetch(baseURL+"shop/",{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify(payload),headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}}).then(function(res){return res.json();});},deleteShop:function deleteShop(id){return fetch(baseURL+"shop/"+id,{method:'DELETE'});}};export default ShopServices;
